Package genericlibrary

Class BaseTest

java.lang.Object
genericlibrary.BaseTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScreenshotUtil
public class BaseTest extends Object
BaseTest is a base class for all test classes that sets up and tears down the WebDriver, initializes page objects, and handles login/logout.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeMethod public void setUp()
      Initializes the page objects before each test method.

    • logout

      @AfterMethod public void logout()
      Logs out the user after each test method. If logout fails, the exception is caught silently.

    • launchBrowser

      @BeforeClass public void launchBrowser(String browser)
      Launches the browser and navigates to the application under test.
      Parameters:
      browser - the browser to use, defaults to "edge" if none is provided.

    • tearDown

      @AfterClass public void tearDown()
      Quits the browser and cleans up resources after all tests have run.

      @BeforeSuite public void clearDir()
